        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">I Was Robbed!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich Wurde Beraubt!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">j'Ai été volé !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu Fui roubado!</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Ληστεύτηκα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Me Robaron!</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity learners will fill in a report about a robbery.</string>

über einen Raub aus.</string>
          </description>

état au sujet d'un vol.</string>

sobre um robbery.</string>

μια έκθεση για μια ληστεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad los principiantes completarán adentro un 
informe sobre un robo.</string>
